sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_pipeline.PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils = Class.create();
PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getPipelineEnvironmentOrderList: function(pipelineSysId) {
        var pipelineUtils = new PipelineUtils();
        var pipelineEnvironmentOrderFields = PipelineConstants.columns.PIPELINE_ENVIRONMENT_ORDER_COLUMNS;
        var environmentFields = PipelineConstants.columns.ENVIRONMENT_COLUMNS;

        var output = [];

        var gr = new GlideRecord(PipelineConstants.table.PIPELINE_ENVIRONMENT_ORDER_TABLE);

        gr.addQuery('pipeline', pipelineSysId);
        gr.orderBy('order');

        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            var environment = pipelineUtils.getObjectFromGlideRecord(gr.environment.getRefRecord(), environmentFields);
            var pipelineEnvironmentOrder = pipelineUtils.getObjectFromGlideRecord(gr, pipelineEnvironmentOrderFields);

            pipelineEnvironmentOrder.environment = environment;

            output.push(pipelineEnvironmentOrder);
        }

        return output;
    },

    type: 'PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-28 21:27:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3f7b13bac3323010a9f5e548fa40dd53</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PipelineEnvironmentOrderUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Pipeline" source="sn_pipeline">e78853e9c3222010b83971e54440dd26</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Pipeline">e78853e9c3222010b83971e54440dd26</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3f7b13bac3323010a9f5e548fa40dd53</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-30 15:51:25</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
